trans-unit.source: A trigger action that stops a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 停止するトリガー アクション、 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: Use a StopStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively stop a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: StopStoryboard アクションで使用、<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>または<xref:System.Windows.Trigger><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>を対話的に停止するには</xref:System.Windows.Trigger></xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: StopStoryboard only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: StopStoryboard のみに影響を与える、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>がアクティブである場合 (後、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>開始) します</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>。

trans-unit.source: Stopping a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: ストーリー ボードのトリガーを停止する、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>と<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>イベント、ではなく、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed>イベント</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>。

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 代わりに<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>が<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>を制御する</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>を参照する必要があります。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: 参照してください[する方法: イベント トリガーを使用して、ストーリー ボードの後に開始を制御する](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)例についてはします。

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or StopStoryboard) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 一時停止、再開、停止、またはそれ以外の場合、ストーリー ボードに対話的にできる制御を一時停止、再開、またはその他の制御、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>対話形式で、設定、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>のプロパティ、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>を使用して、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>オブジェクト (など<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>、 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>、または StopStoryboard) その<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>を参照することで制御する</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 場合、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>の<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>は指定されていない、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>を開始した後に対話的に制御できません</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>。

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 参照してください[する方法: イベント トリガーを使用して、ストーリー ボードの後に開始を制御する](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md)詳細についてはします。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンスを初期化、 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard"> </xref>クラスです。
